title: Benchmarking Event concept (ELIXIR-EXCELERATE WP2 Benchmarking schemas)

_id.title: The unique id of the benchmarking event, according to the rules. For submissions there are temporary identifiers

oneOf.description: Identifiers used on submission must not begin with OEB. Client tools must use always this pattern to validate
Temporary identifiers internally used must follow this pattern
Identifiers returned by the APIs must follow this pattern

_schema.title: The JSON schema absolute URI. It must match the value of 'id' in the JSON schema

orig_id.title: The benchmarking event original id
orig_id.description: The field is filled in on server side, and it contains the original id used on data submission for this benchmarking event, used by the community

dates.title: Relevant dates for this benchmarking event

creation.title: Creation date of the benchmarking event

modification.title: Last modification date of the benchmarking event

public.title: The date when this benchmarking event becomes public

url.title: The link to the benchmarking event

community_id.title: The community id where this benchmarking event belongs

references.title: The benchmarking event reference id(s) (if any)
